duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage member engagement programs to build member loyalty and promote growth and retention.
Develop and implement an online community management strategic plan for a professional networking community for members and non-members.
Track and analyze community metrics to assess the effectiveness of community initiatives and make data-driven decisions for improvement.
Assist in improving new member experience through a strategic onboarding and orientation process, as well as liaising with other departments to ensure a seamless user experience.
Administer member recognition programs and develop reporting to show growth and utilization of programs and member satisfaction.
Liaise with other departments to increase understanding of membership value and benefits.
Attend events for in-person recruitment, retention, and engagement efforts as well as department support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Project Management, or related field or equivalent experience
